Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.


We’ve worked hard to create one of the best apps for expectant mothers. Send your feedback to team@wachanga.com (mailto:team@wachanga.com)—we’re here to support women and parents every step of the way.

"i-NTER SHOT" is an innovative application which supports high quality microscope photographing.
In order to attach an iPhone to a microscope, please use the dedicated adaptor “i-NTER LENS”.
Here is the information site of “i-NTER LENS”
https://www.microscope-net.com/products/smartphone/inter-lens-eng/

[ NEW functions in i-NTER SHOT2 ]

- Display Scale and put into a picture

- Electron Microscope mode

- Monochrome mode

- Capture information and comment record / put into a picture

- Video mode

[ Valuable functions for the microscope imaging ]

- Pass Shutter
Passing your hand over the front speaker becomes a shutter of a camera without touching the screen. You can take pictures without vibrations.

- Magnification

- Grid display
Three grids are available for an accurate alignment.

- Erect and Invert
In order to adapt the display and photo to the inverted microscope, elect and invert function is available.

- White Balance
In addition to Auto White Balance Correction, manual adjustment is available.
Two metrics (Color Temperature and Tint) adjustments enable the ideal color representation.

- Exposure Correction
In addition to Auto Compensation of the brightness, you can modify the brightness manually.
This enables you to take a suitable picture of even the dark fluorescent specimen.

- Full screen display
In order to check the details of the displaying image,  you can temporarily disappear whole items on the screen and display the image with full screen.

- Dedicated photo list
In order to manage the photos taken by this application, a dedicated photo list is available.

-  Disclosure/Non-Disclosure mode of photos
In order not to mix private photos and photos taken by this app, you can hide photos taken by this app on Moment.

- External Display
Camera preview on an external display by way of AppleTV and HDMI is available.
Remarkable full screen display of the camera preview is available with the rotation of the preview on the display in steps of 90 degrees.

In order to utilize this application, i-NTER LENS that is a attachment lens between iPhone and Microscope is necessary.
https://www.microscope-net.com/products/smartphone/inter-lens-eng/

Buy genuine medicines, baby, nutrition, healthcare, personal care, diabetes, and other specialty products at the best prices using the MedPlus Mart App. This app provides you access to all the services provided by MedPlus pharmacies conveniently from the comfort of your home through an easy-to-use interface.

MedPlus Mart App is a comprehensive medical App where you can not only order medicines but also read important information about the medicines you take, their alternatives or substitutes, precautions, and their side effects. Medicine delivery is restricted to states where MedPlus operates, but you can order other OTC & health products, nutrition, baby care, diabetes care, and personal care products from across many regions & cities in India.

Some Key Features of the MedPlus Mart App:

- Order medicines for home delivery - Search & select the medicines you require, upload your medicine list, and tell us your delivery address. Our registered pharmacist will verify, authorize and process your order and get it delivered to your home. We deliver your medicines in most cities in 6-24 hrs and about 2-3 days in most other places.

- Order medicines for click & pick - Search & select the medicines you require, select a MedPlus store near you for pick up, and confirm the order. We will send you an SMS when the order is ready for pickup. Come to the store at a time convenient for you, show our pharmacist your medicine list, and take your medicines home. No queues and no worries about the availability of medicines.

- Assisted orders - If you are not sure how to read your medicine list or what medicines to select, just upload your prescription with the medicine list. Our customer care representative will call you and help you with the order.
In case you need any doctor's consultation you can opt for the same.

- Order general products from a comprehensive range of baby, healthcare, nutrition, personal care, diabetes care, and OTC products. Home delivery or click and pick.

- Save up to 35% on medicines with FlexiRewards - our rewards program lets you choose cash or household products on your purchases giving you flexibility and the best value for your hard-earned money.

- Search for medicine availability at a MedPlus store near you - Just select the medicine you are looking for and click a button for a list of MedPlus stores near you where the medicine is available for purchase in real-time.

- Get complete information about medicines you take including indications, adverse effects, precautions, and alternatives.

- Locate the nearest MedPlus store – The App will automatically detect your current location and help you locate the nearest store or you can locate a store by entering your locality information manually if desired.

- Keep all your health records in one place - MedPlus Mart App provides you unlimited storage to upload and keep all your health records in one place. Medicine list history and previous orders are automatically recorded and available at any time.

- Print your bills anytime - All your MedPlus bills are available in one place in the App for you to print anytime, anywhere.

- Redeem FlexiRewards points - You can view available points and redeem your points for delivery or pick up through the MedPlus Mart App.

- Set up a Pill Reminder – if you are having trouble remembering when to take your medicines, set up a pill reminder through the App for alerts on your phone reminding you to take the pill at the time it is due.

About MedPlus
MedPlus is one of India's leading and reputed pharmacy networks with over 2980+ stores in 7 states and 374 cities offering genuine medicines, superior service, and great value for money to its customers.

Many pediatric dentist use oral conscious sedation as an adjunct to traditional behavior management techniques. Many different drug combinations exist and the dosages within them vary even further.
The pediatric dental sedation app is a quick and simple way to verify dosages of local anesthesia, oral sedation, and emergency reversal drugs. Instead of repeatedly calculating medications by hand, this app makes the process as simple as a few button clicks. In addition, all of the important values are located in one convenient location.

Calculations are conservative in nature and are based off of generally accepted values. 

Drugs and dosages are listed below:

Lidocaine: 4 mg/kg
Septocaine: 5mg/kg
Hydroxyzine: 1mg/kg
Meperidine: 2mg/kg
Midazolam: 0.5mg/kg (oral), 0.2mg/kg (nasal)
Diazepam: 0.25mg/kg
Epinephrine: 0.01mg/kg
Flumazenil: 0.01mg/kg
Naloxone: 0.1mg/kg

The information is to be used as a tool. All values should be independently calculated prior to administering drugs. Concentration of drugs are listed in the app.

Designed by radiologists, for radiologists. Stop wasting time searching for complex diagnostic criteria or performing tedious calculations. Radiology Calculators is the ultimate mobile toolkit for medical imaging professionals, providing fast, accurate, and easy-to-use calculators to streamline your workflow and enhance your diagnostic confidence.
Our clean, native interface is designed for speed and simplicity, allowing you to get the information you need in seconds, not minutes. All calculators are available OFFLINE, ensuring reliability when you need it most.

A COMPREHENSIVE CALCULATOR SUITE:
Our extensive library covers the scoring systems, classifications, and volume measurements you use every day.

Body Imaging
* AAST Trauma Injury Scoring (Kidney, Liver, Spleen)
* Adrenal Nodule Washout for CT
* Adrenal Nodule Chemical Shift on MRI
* Bladder Volume
* Bosniak Classification of Renal Cystic Masses
* C-RADS ™ 2023 (CT Colonography)
* Glomerular Filtration Rate (GFR)
* Gonadal (Ovarian and Testicular) Volume
* LI-RADS ® (Liver Imaging Reporting and Data System, AKA LIRADS)
* Liver Steatosis (CT & MRI)
* Liver Volume (CT, MRI, US) with Expected Normal
* O-RADS ™ 2022 (Ovarian-Adnexal Reporting and Data System, AKA ORADS)
* Pancreatitis Severity Index and Collections
* PI-RADS ® 2.1 (Prostate Imaging Reporting and Data System, AKA PIRADS)
* Prostate Volume & PSA Density
* RENAL Nephrometry Score
* Spleen Index & Volume
* Thyroid Volume
* TI-RADS ™ (Thyroid Imaging Reporting and Data System, AKA TIRADS)

Cardiothoracic Imaging

* CAD-RADS ™ 2.0 (Coronary Artery Disease Reporting and Data System)

* Fleischner Guidelines for Pulmonary Nodules
* LUNG-RADS ® 2022 (Lung Cancer Screening Reporting and Data System)

Emergency Radiology
* AAST Trauma Injury Scoring (Kidney, Liver, Spleen)
* AO Spine Classification

Musculoskeletal Imaging
* AO Spine Classification
* Bone-RADS ™ v. 2023
* NI-RADS ™ (Neck Imaging Reporting and Data System)

Neuroradiology
* AO Spine Classification
* NASCET & ECST: Carotid Stenosis based on CTA & MRA
* NI-RADS ™ (Neck Imaging Reporting and Data System)

Vascular & Interventional Radiology
* NASCET & ECST: Carotid Stenosis based on CTA & MRA
* Pulmonary Embolism Severity Index (PESI)
* Resistive Index
* Villalta Score for Post-thrombotic Syndrome

Women's Imaging
* Gestational Age
* Gonadal (Ovarian and Testicular) Volume
* O-RADS ™ 2022 (Ovarian-Adnexal Reporting and Data System, AKA ORADS)

APP FEATURES:
+ Favorites & Reordering: Save and sort your most-used calculators for instant access.
+ Powerful Search: Instantly find any calculator by name or keyword.
+ Dark & Light Modes: A clean interface that adapts to your device's theme.
+ Offline Access: All calculators are available offline, ensuring 100% reliability.

WHO IS THIS FOR?
-> Radiologists
-> Radiology Residents & Fellows
-> Referring Physicians and other Medical Professionals

What to Expect is the world’s best-known baby development and growth tracker app chosen by more than 15 million parents. We’re the parenting, infant and family planning brand, offering you a free all-in-one pregnancy and baby tracker app with thousands of medically accurate articles, daily pregnancy updates, expert baby growth tracking, and personalized parenting tips to help you nurture a healthy pregnancy, a thriving baby, and confident parenting.

Find guides for every step of your growing family’s journey—from starting a family and recognizing early signs of pregnancy to navigating motherhood, newborn care, and the baby and toddler years. Find support and connection with moms, parents, and parents-to-be throughout your pregnancy journey.

During Pregnancy

After Baby’s Arrival

Family Planning

The textbook is dead. Long live CorePendium! CorePendium is the first truly comprehensive, continuously updated, peer-reviewed, multimedia clinical reference for Emergency and Urgent Care Medicine. Download the CorePendium App and bring the best clinical reference text with you anywhere in the world, regardless of connectivity. With your EM:RAP account, the CorePendium App allows you to join over 65,000 members of the CorePendium community.

The CorePendium App gives you…

  •  EXPERT-BACKED CONTENT — Written, edited, and peer-reviewed by a team of over 800 leading academics and practitioners, every CorePendium chapter is continuously revised by leading experts in emergency medicine and beyond.

  •  INTEGRATED MEDIA — Comprehensive learning requires more than just words. Dive into our constantly growing media library of ECG’s and X-rays, as well as expertly-produced videos and audio segments. Look, listen, and learn, all without leaving the CorePendium App.

  •  OFFLINE MODE — With new chapters being added and updated frequently to reflect the latest literature and practice guidelines, the CorePendium App makes sure you always have the newest information at your fingertips, 24 hours a day. The app looks for updates to its offline database every time you’re active online, so that you have the answers you need, no matter what. Do you want access to our skillfully-shot procedure videos and expert commentary away from a wireless connection? You can choose to download our audio and video content to ensure access when you need it most. 

  •  INTUITIVE NAVIGATION — Designed to prioritize all of the crucial information and media needed for the critical patient, CorePendium’s ‹Rapid Access› section gives you the quick insights you’ll need at the bedside. If you are looking for more background, the ‹Deep Dive› section provides all the information you’ll need to know about a topic. Sleek chapter sidebars, internal searches, search filters, and curated tabs ensure you can find what you need when you need it. 

  •  MEDICAL CALCULATORS — Get all of the commonly used clinical scoring and decision tools you need, with important interpretation data compiled by some of medicine’s foremost experts just a thumb slide away. Our calculators are also integrated with the content that uses it most. 

  •  PART OF THE EM:RAP KNOWLEDGE BASE — CorePendium is just one piece of the EM:RAP universe. The CorePendium App takes full advantage of its special connection to the most listened to programs in Emergency and Urgent Care Medicine by integrating that content. With continuously updated links to video, conference content, and podcasts you’ll always get the most cutting-edge answers.

  •  INTERNATIONAL — CorePendium is for the whole world. We have an international advisory board that aims to address emergency care for patients and practitioners in all of the various environments where it is practiced.

  •  EDITORIAL INDEPENDENCE — CorePendium is written by clinicians for clinicians, without the support of advertising or industry. With the CorePendium App you just get the best information, current and expertly reviewed.

  •  THE REFERENCE OF RECORD — Accessed millions of times, CorePendium is already the reference textbook used by residency training programs and frontline clinicians the world over.

The most exciting update of iThermonitor app ever! Besides the brand-new user interface, the Temperature Analysis shows the highest temperature and the duration of fever for each episode. The Temperature Trend Chart combines temperature chart  and fever related events, enabling the doctor to understand your child’s fever progression in a more informed way. For those who have more than one child, one smartphone can now connect with multiple iThermonitor sensors.

24/7 MONITORING - Connecting with the iThermonitor sensor, this app collects temperature data every 4 seconds and develops a temperature chart.
HIGH TEMPERATURE ALERT – The app captures your child’s abnormal temperature in real time so that you can take necessary actions immediately.   
DATA ANALYSIS - Professional data analysis of body temperatures through collaboration with Boston Children’s Hospital, affiliated hospital of Harvard Medical School.
FEVER TIPS- Free access to the Fever Management Information framework – Thermia, licensed from Boston Children’s Hospital, the #1 pediatric hospital in the US.
ANYWHERE, ANYTIME – For parents and grandparents, wherever you are, you can always monitor your children’s temperature.

iThermonitor has integrated with the Health App and you can sync body temperature data to the Health app (requires iOS8).
